00131 struct wavSortCriterion : binary_function<pair<int, float>, pair<int, float>, bool>
00132 {
00133     bool operator()(const pair<int, float>& lhs, const pair<int, float>& rhs) const {
00134         return lhs.first < rhs.first;
00135     }
00136 };
